page.title: 10Pig farming Church/BrookFarm
page.content:
A typical pig farm has about 470 pigs.It is quite difficult to run a pig farm and Mr.Dickenson has always bred pigs.When the piglets are born they weigh about 2 pounds.Mr.Dickenson does not buy them as piglets.The pigs eat a mixture of barley,wheat,beans and peas made into small pellets.He has had this lot for 4 to 5 weeks.The price of a pig would be around Â£30.A sow has 25 piglets a year.There are 12 different breeds of pig in England.He keeps the pigs for appx 13 weeks he loses about 1\% through sickness.
Machinery=Tractor,trailers,scraper.
Labour=Mr.Dickenson and some family help.
